de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.mallet.topicmodel

Class MalletTopicModelEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent_ImplBase
      • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.Annotator_ImplBase
        • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
          • org.apache.uima.fit.component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
            • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.mallet.topicmodel.MalletTopicModelEstimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent

    public class MalletTopicModelEstimator
extends org.apache.uima.fit.component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
    Estimate an LDA topic model using Mallet and write it to a file. It stores all incoming CAS' to Mallet Instances before estimating the model, using a ParallelTopicModel.

        public static final String PARAM_TYPE_NAME

        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_MIN_TOKEN_LENGTH

        public static final String PARAM_MIN_TOKEN_LENGTH
        Ignore tokens (or lemmas, respectively) that are shorter than the given value. Default: 3.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_MODEL_ENTITY_TYPE

        public static final String PARAM_MODEL_ENTITY_TYPE
        If specific, the text contained in the given segmentation type annotations are fed as separate units to the topic model estimator e.g. de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.segmentation.type.sentence. Text that is not within such annotations is ignored.

        By default, the full document text is used as a document.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_ALPHA_SUM

        public static final String PARAM_ALPHA_SUM
        The sum of alphas over all topics. Default: 1.0.

        Another recommended value is 50 / T (number of topics).

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_BETA

        public static final String PARAM_BETA
        Beta for a single dimension of the Dirichlet prior. Default: 0.01.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • generateTokenSequences

        protected Collection<cc.mallet.types.TokenSequence> generateTokenSequences(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJCas)
                                                                    throws FeaturePathException
        Generate one or multiple TokenSequences from the given document. If PARAM_MODEL_ENTITY_TYPE is set, an instance is generated from each segment annotated with the given type. Otherwise, one instance is generated from the whole document.
        Parameters:
        aJCas -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        FeaturePathException

      • generateTokenSequence

        protected static cc.mallet.types.TokenSequence generateTokenSequence(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJCas,
                                                                     org.apache.uima.cas.Type tokenType,
                                                                     boolean useLemma,
                                                                     int minTokenLength)
                                                              throws FeaturePathException
        Generate a TokenSequence from the whole document.
        Parameters:
        aJCas - a CAS holding the document
        tokenType - this type will be used as token, e.g. Token, N-gram etc.
        useLemma - if this is true, use lemmas
        minTokenLength - the minimum token length to use
        Returns:
        a TokenSequence
        Throws:
        FeaturePathException - if the annotation type specified in PARAM_TYPE_NAME cannot be extracted.
